title: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian get nostalgic with amazing throwback snaps
text:
The good Kardashian genes are strong (Picture: Getty/@kimkardashian)

Kim and Kourtney Kardashian threw it right back to their teens as they got their nineties nostalgia on by sharing a series of family photographs.

The ultra-glam TV personalities posted the vintage snaps from their teenage years to Instagram, harking back to a time when fashions were different and the girls’ faces look, erm, pretty different too.

Over on Kourtney’s Instagram, the oldest Kardashian sibling shared an incredible photo of herself and her sibling on a family ski trip and everything about it screams ‘pre-millenium’.

Wearing her hair in a pink bandana (very X-Tina), the then 17-year-old Kourtney practices her smize for the camera while 16-year-old Kim sports an oversized hoodie that surely has to be the inspirations for Kanye’s Yeezy collection.

Representing their status through rabbit emojis, Kourtney simply captioned the post: ‘Circa 1996’.

Opting to show off the girls in their most glamourous party couture instead, Kim’s photograph featured a fam holiday to Armenia in their teens, with Kourtney wearing a light blue plunging tshirt and Kim going for a white strapless dress.

Stunning in the snow (Picture: @kourtneykardash)

While both outfits are pretty timeless, we’re obsessed with the full on 90s accessories in this picture: from Kim’s just-below-the-knee high boots and white hair bows to Kourtney’s boho necklace.

Advertisement

Advertisement

And of course, the most nostalgic accessory of all: the super thin eyebrows. The overriding emotion we feel looking at this picture is relief that bushy brows are back for good.

It’s been a week full of emotional family memories for the Kardashian siblings, after Kim commemorated the death of her late father Robert Kardashian on Monday.

Robert, best known for his work as OJ Simpson’s lawyer, died 16 years ago on 30 September 2003 at the age of 59 following a battle with esophageal cancer.

On Monday morning, Kim, 38, shared an adorable photo of herself and Kourtney planting a kiss on either side of the lawyer’s cheeks.

Alongside the sweet snap, Kim wrote: ‘Miss you dad. Can’t believe today would be 16 years since you went to heaven.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian threw it right back to their teens as they got their nineties nostalgia on by sharing a series of family photographs.
